artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description:
Blue dominates.  Plain weave or Twill variation.
Similar to Pomegranate. Blue, blue/green & olive warp. 2 med tan weft. Plain weave variation.  On 8.5x11" card with 99.1.1213.25.  "H-8B" writen on card. (blue, blue/green, olive, tan & metallic)
